content:
Comments can be submitted using HL7 Jira at https://jira.hl7.org/projects/FHIR/ and specifying "SMART Health Cards: Vaccination and Testing (FHIR)" as the Specification.

A list of HL7 Jira issues for the IG is generated at https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=15300 (for any user logged in to HL7 Jira)
